column4: hey, my gnome-terminal bell isn't working, depite the fat that it's enabled and all other sound works.  the problem just started when I upgraded to 11.04.  Anybody have any ideas where to look?
if you're on a laptop, it might not have an internal speaker for that. I had that same problem and gave up on it
I am on a laptop, but is that a change between 11.04 and previous versions?  I thought that it played a little click sound through the normal speakers?
I never got it to work on my laptop, so I don't know how it sounds
